problem.markdown:
1. For a link with constant angular velocity which is constant?
(x) Magnitude of linear velocity of a point on link () Direction of linear velocity of a point on link () Magnitude and Direction of linear velocity of a point on link () Neither Magnitude nor Direction of linear velocity of a point on link
2. Angular velocity of a fixed link is
(x) zero () same as input link () same as coupler link () None of these
3. Angular Acceleration of input link rotating with constant angular velocity is
() Negative (x) Zero () Positive () Can't be Determined
4. For a 20cm link rotating about one end with an angular velocity of 2 rad/s what will be the linear velocity of the other end ?
() 80cm/s () 400cm/s () 800cm/s (x) 40cm/s
5. For a link with constant angular velocity which is constant?
(x) Magnitude of linear velocity of a point on link () Direction of linear velocity of a point on link () Magnitude and Direction of linear velocity of a point on link () Neither Magnitude nor Direction of linear velocity of a point on link
problem.p: 1. For a link with constant angular velocity which is constant?

choicegroup.choice: Magnitude of linear velocity of a point on link
Direction of linear velocity of a point on link
Magnitude and Direction of linear velocity of a point on link
Neither Magnitude nor Direction of linear velocity of a point on link
